subject: Re: when junit4 will be available to download
msgSnippet: Dunno.  In the meantime you can always get the source via anonymous CVS, and build it yourself... good luck, p ... pl. forward the link from where i can
messageBody:
Dunno. In the meantime you can always get the source via anonymous
CVS, and build it yourself...

good luck,
p

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, venkata srihari <nvshari_11@y...> wrote:
> Hello All,
> When JUnit4 will be available to download. if it is already existed
pl. forward the link from where i can download and start using it.
> thanks and regards,
> SriHari
>
> Cedric Beust <cbeust@g...> wrote:

easier
> to copy/paste into the implementing class (although Eclipse is
taking care
> of this for me most of the time).
